function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Widespread knowledge of green roofs","Impact":"Increased interest in installing green roofs","Mitigation":"Provide education on the benefits of green roofs","Technologies":"Green roof technology","People":"Homeowners, building developers","Owner":"Educational institutions, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Cost and maintenance concerns","Impact":"Discourages installation of green roofs","Mitigation":"Offer financial incentives, provide low-maintenance green roof options","Technologies":"Low-maintenance green roof technology, financial assistance programs","People":"Homeowners, building developers","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, building developers"},{"Description":"Confinement conditions and perception change","Impact":"Increased interest in green spaces and green roof installations","Mitigation":"Promote the benefits of green roofs, incentivize green roof installations","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns, incentive programs","People":"Citizens, homeowners","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
